Description_lang: Rehgar Earthfury is a powerful elemental shaman and former gladiator who has mastered the ways of combat.$b$bThere are few members of the Earthen Ring who can match Rehgar's experience and prowess on the battlefield.
AuraDescription_lang: Rehgar Earthfury commands the powers of the elements to defeat his enemies.

name_blz.zh_CN: 追随者：雷加尔·大地之怒

description_blz.en_US: Rehgar Earthfury is a powerful elemental shaman and former gladiator who has mastered the ways of combat.00There are few members of the Earthen Ring who can match Rehgar's experience and prowess on the battlefield.
description_blz.es_MX: Rehgar Furiatierra es un poderoso chamán elemental y antiguo gladiador que domina los caminos del combate.00Hay pocos miembros del Anillo de la Tierra que pueden igualar la experiencia y la destreza de Rehgar en el campo de batalla.
description_blz.pt_BR: Rehgar Terrafúria é um poderoso xamã elemental que, com um passado de gladiador, dominou as minúcias do combate. Há poucos membros da Harmonia Telúrica capazes de superar Rehgar em experiência e bravura no campo de batalha.
description_blz.de_DE: Rehgar Erdenwut ist ein mächtiger Elementarschamane und ein ehemaliger Gladiator, der die Kunst des Kampfes gemeistert hat.00Der Irdene Ring hat nur wenige Anhänger, die über Rehgars Erfahrung und Können auf dem Schlachtfeld verfügen.
description_blz.en_GB: Rehgar Earthfury is a powerful elemental shaman and former gladiator who has mastered the ways of combat.00There are few members of the Earthen Ring who can match Rehgar's experience and prowess on the battlefield.
description_blz.es_ES: Rehgar Furiatierra es un poderoso chamán elemental y antiguo gladiador que domina el arte del combate.00Pocos son los miembros del Anillo de la Tierra con la experiencia y la destreza en el campo de batalla de Rehgar.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Rehgar Rageterre est un puissant chaman élémentaire et un ancien gladiateur passé maître dans l’art du combat.

Rares sont les membres du Cercle terrestre qui peuvent égaler son expérience et son talent sur le champ de bataille.
description_blz.it_IT: Rehgar Terrafuriosa è un potente Sciamano Elementale, un tempo gladiatore, esperto delle arti del combattimento.00Ci sono pochi membri del Circolo della Terra che possono eguagliare l'esperienza e l'abilità di Rehgar sul campo di battaglia.
description_blz.ru_RU: Регар Ярость Земли – могущественный шаман, обретший полную гармонию со стихиями, бывший гладиатор, закаленный в битвах.00Среди Служителей Земли мало кто сравнится с Регаром в опытности и мастерстве на поле боя.
description_blz.ko_KR:
레가르 어스퓨리는 강력한 정기 주술사입니다. 또한, 전투의 모든 것을 터득한 전직 검투사이기도 합니다.

레가르만큼 실전 경험이 풍부하고 뛰어난 싸움 실력을 지닌 자는 대지 고리회 내에서도 극소수에 불과합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 過去曾是競技場鬥士的雷加‧地怒，如今是充分掌握戰鬥技巧的元素薩滿。00陶土議會的其他成員中，鮮少有人比得過雷加在戰場上的經驗與英勇氣概。
description_blz.zh_CN: 雷加尔·大地之怒是一名强大的元素萨满祭司，作为曾经的角斗士，他精通战斗的技巧。00若论战斗的经验与技艺，大地之环的成员中很少有人能与他媲美。
